                       java.lang.String loc,

                       int numStudents,
                       double perFem,
                       double satVerbal,
                       double satMath,
                       double tuition,
                       double perFinancialAid,
                       int numApplicants,
                       double perAccepted,
                       double perEnroll,
                       int academicScale,
                       int social,
                       int qualOfLife,
                       java.lang.String studyArea1,
                       java.lang.String studyArea2,
                       java.lang.String studyArea3,
                       java.lang.String studyArea4,
                       java.lang.String studyArea5)
        Edits a schools informations
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the school
        state -
        loc - the city location
        control - who owns the school
        numStudents - number of students
        perFem - percent of female students
        satVerbal - the average verbal SAT score
        satMath - the average math SAT score
        tuition - cost of tuition
        perFinancialAid - the percent of students receiving financial aid
        numApplicants - number of people who apply to the school
        perAccepted - the percent of applicants who get accepted
        perEnroll - precent of people who actually enroll
        academicScale - the academic scale of the school
        social - the scale of social life
        qualOfLife - scale of the quality of life of students
        studyArea1 - area the school specializes in
        studyArea2 -
        studyArea3 -
        studyArea4 -
        studyArea5 -
